DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , open-label , prospective study . Ten ( 10 ) subject meet inclusion criterion enrol site 's pool patient . Subjects female age 25-65 , suitable treatment area ( e.g . skin irregularity and/or unwanted skin laxity Mons pubis , Introitus and/or Labia area ) . Subjects receive three treatment study device , four week interval , follow one month follow-up visit last treatment .
